See with your own eyes the action scenes from shooting and find out what it is really like to make a movie.

programme.title: Audreys Rain
programme.desc: Heart-warming drama about a bitter, sharp-tongued spinster, whose future looks bleakwhen she is saddled with raising her nephew and niece after her sister commits suicide. Audrey resents that her family has robbed her of a life of her own, but when her childhood sweetheart reappears on the scene, her life takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: What happens when you strike one vivacious Italian bombshell who wants to do it all against a jaded P.I. whos already done it? You get a spark thats hard to resist, a murder you cant ignore and a crime solving duo you just cant match.

programme.title: Falling in Love with the Girl Next Door
programme.desc: Mark Lucas and Theresa Connolly fall in love but their overbearing mothers ruin their wedding plans and possibly their future together.

programme.title: Life on Liberty Street
programme.desc: Heartwarming drama with Annabeth Gish. After losing her husband and job, a single mothers life changes unexpectedly while working at a care centre for brain trauma patients.

programme.title: The Colt
programme.desc: During the heat of battle in the midst of the Civil War, a beguilingly innocent colt is born to Union Jim Rabbs beloved mare. Refusing the orders to shoot it, lest it prove a hindrance, Rabb keeps the colt as a consolation in these desperate times-a symbol of hope that leads the men of the First Cavalry on a journey of self-discovery and newfound brotherhood.

programme.title: Monte Walsh
programme.desc: Montelius "Monte" Walsh (Tom Selleck) is an aging cowboy facing the final days of the Wild West era. He and his friend Chet Rollins (Keith Carradine), another long-time cowhand, work at whatever ranch work comes their way, but "nothing they cant do from a horse". Their lives are divided between months on the range and the occasional trip into town. Camaraderie and competition with the other cowboys fill their days. They seek work and take a job at the ranch of Cal Brennan (William Devane), where they meet an old friend, Shorty Austin (George Eads), another ranch hand.

programme.title: Annies Point
programme.desc: Richard Eason is flat-out filling his late fathers shoes as CEO of an east Coast real estate developing company, so he cant spend nearly as much time with mother Annie and daughter Ella as they would like. Annie is dead-set on visiting a place in California where she and her late husband hoped to build their dream house and convinces Ella, who wants to drop out of school and aspires a singing career, to drive along. Ill-prepared but tempestuously stubborn, they embark on an adventurous road trip, where Ella meets hunky waiter Scott Tardy. Learning Annie needs surgery soon, Richard gives chase.

programme.title: Out of the Woods
programme.desc: Drama with Jason London. A self-absorbed young lawyer with ties to the material things in life gets an eye-opening experience when he visits his nature-loving grandfather.

programme.title: Dinotopia
programme.desc: Based loosely on the novels by James Gurney, Dinotopia is a fantasy adventure series following two young brothers who wash up on the shore of the titular island, a magical lost paradise where humans and dinosaurs live together. Karl and David Scott are half-brothers enjoying a flight with their father on his private aircraft when tragedy strikes and the plane crashes to the ground. When they wash up on land, their adventure begins, learning about this hidden civilisation and begin to adjust to their surroundings. The three-episode show aired in 2002, starring Wentworth Miller, Tyron Leitso, and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Wyvern
programme.desc: The small Alaskan town of Beaver Mills is located just north of the Arctic Circle, meaning that the sun does not set during the summer solstice. As the town prepares for its annual celebration of this event, a wyvern is awakened by the melting of the ice caps, and attacks a fisherman. Jake (Nick Chinlund), a handyman fixing the cafe where a waitress named Claire (Erin Karpluk) works, hurts his hand and David (David Lewis (Canadian actor)), the towns doctor, examines it. While driving back to town, David is attacked by the wyvern. The next morning, Sheriff Dawson (John Shaw) and Jake hear gunshots and find Haas (Barry Corbin), a redneck attacked by the wyvern. Colonel (Don S. Davis), who has seen the Wyvern, goes to town to warn the citizens; but they disbelieve him, and he goes to kill it. Dawson radios to his Deputy Susie (Elaine Miles) to watch the town, but fails to convey his meaning. Dawson finds his friend dead, and returns. At the town, the wyvern kills Susie and several other people. Jake, Claire, Haas, and the eccentric Edna (Karen Austin) take shelter in the cafe. Later, Vinyl (Tinsel Korey), who runs the towns radio, and Farley (Simon Longmore), another citizen, hide in the cafe. Sheriff Dawson is killed by the wyvern. Jake and Claire track the wyvern into the woods, where they find the Colonel, and discover the wyvern is killing anyone on the Interstate. Farley is injured trying to get supplies. The wyvern then uses David, still alive, as bait to draw people from the cafe. Jake goes to rescue him, and Farley distracts the wyvern to save them, but is eaten. David tells the group the Wyvern has eggs, and dies of his injuries. The survivors decide to electrify the nest, but the wyvern kills Haas. Jake takes a truck left on the side of the road and, using the eggs as bait, kills the wyvern. Jake, Claire, Colonel, Vinyl, and Edna try again to radio for help.

programme.title: Henry VIII: Man, Monarch, Monster
programme.desc: The opening episode sees our experts examine how Henry VIIIs traumatic childhood affected his personality – from the death of his older brother, which made him heir to the throne of England, to the tragic early death of his beloved mother. The effect of her death on Henry is dramatically revealed in a recent discovery of an extraordinary, illustrated manuscript portraying the young prince weeping inconsolably over her loss. Henrys complex relationship with his controlling father – Henry VII – is explored as he kept the teenage Henry as a virtual prisoner, passing on his own paranoia that would mark his sons personality for the rest of his life. As soon as his father dies and Henry becomes King Henry VIII, he brutally executes his fathers closest advisors and issues a public proclamation criticising the old Kings reign. Alongside death and fraught family relationships, this episode charts the extraordinary rise of Cardinal Wolsey – the son of a commoner who rises ruthlessly through the court to become Henrys chief advisor and closest friend. With exclusive access to the archives of the Vatican Library, Tudor expert Dr Tracy Borman analyses an account from a foreign ambassador, which has never appeared on camera before – it reveals Wolseys expertise in manipulating Henry and includes incredible detail about their complex personal relationship. Their friendship unravels however, when Wolsey fails to get Henrys divorce agreed so he can marry Anne Boleyn and Wolsey falls from Henrys grace as quickly as he rose. Strange quirks begin to appear in Henrys personality. He becomes obsessed with the problem that would dominate his reign – his lack of a male heir – and he becomes increasingly controlling, developing an unnerving habit of avoiding direct eye contact with others. In his rise to power, Henry has transformed from an anxious prince into a powerful monarch completely convinced of his own supremacy – but in the process, he will plunge the country into chaos.

programme.title: Henry VIII: Man, Monarch, Monster
programme.desc: This episode takes viewers on a journey of marriage, affairs and tyrannical politics. It explores how Henrys obsession with marrying Anne Boleyn results in a cataclysmic and hugely unpopular split with the Roman Catholic Church, while his relationship with Anne turns from infatuation to deadly hatred. Tudor expert Dr Tracy Borman reveals the true nature of Henrys early infatuation when she visits the archives of the Vatican Library in Rome to catch a privileged glimpse of Henrys love letters to Anne. Henry also has a secret weapon, his new chief advisor and enforcer – Thomas Cromwell – who personally oversees the plunder and destruction of Catholic monasteries across the land. But, Henrys behaviour is becoming increasingly paranoid and tyrannical. Historian Dr Robert Hutchinson visits the Parliamentary Archives to see the legal document – The Treason Act – that turned Tudor England into a virtual dictatorship under Henry. He also examines a striking contemporary diary entry, which reveals that a jousting injury probably caused Henry to have a traumatic brain injury, making him irritable and suspicious of everyone around him. After the accident, Henrys court becomes a nest of vipers where no one is safe, particularly Anne Boleyn and Thomas Cromwell, who bear the brunt of the Kings increasingly unhinged behaviour. Desperate to save his own neck, Thomas Cromwell plots against Anne, finding evidence that she had an affair behind Henrys back with not one but five men. Anne is found guilty of treason and executed. Thomas Cromwell has out manoeuvred her, and Henry has got what he wanted – the chance for a new wife and a male heir.

programme.title: Deadly Isolation
programme.desc: Mystery thriller. While still struggling to come to terms with her partners suicide, a widowed artist (Sherilyn Fenn, Twin Peaks, Wild at Heart) lets a handsome lodger (Nicholas Lea) into her isolated cottage by the sea, unaware that he is an escaped convict and part of a gang of diamond thieves who are intent on recovering their stash, which her late partner had kept hidden for them.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Preposterous Pets
programme.desc: In this programme, we delve into the stories of eccentric individuals who have developed a special relationship with unusual, exotic animals, ranging from giant alligators and polar bears to deadly scorpions and wild capybaras. Join us as we set out on a journey across the globe to meet these extraordinary pets and their owners.

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Extinct or Alive is an Animal Planet documentary show exploring the possible existence of animals thought to be extinct. Biologist and explorer Forrest Galante follows real life stories and visits wildlife locations across the planet, hoping to discover proof that animals such as the Zanzibar leopard or the Galapagos tortoise still exist. Find out if his methods will bring new exciting discoveries. Could animals we think are extinct for a century still be found in nature?

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Follow the daily work of devoted agents from the Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries as they protect the natural resources of the state of Louisiana. Join them as they patrol across the country, stopping illegal activities and rescuing wounded animals.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Gulf Coast Veterinary Specialists is a high-tech surgical animal hospital serving the greater Houston area. The over 200 Doctors and technicians see over 50,000 patients a year from every walk of life. Over the course of the week, the staff sees several exotic animals and many dogs with advanced health concerns. Mikka, an 18-foot reticulated python finally slithers still for a set of radiographs to insure against pneumonia. Coco the Dalmatian needs a risky surgery to remove a cyst that is hampering her spinal function. The Houston Zoo brings two animals in, Old Lady, a 31 year old Blue-Billed Curassow with a broken leg that Dr. Brian Beale surgically repairs, and Smoots the Meerkat, who gets a tooth extraction from Dr. Chanda Miles.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Follow the daily work of devoted agents from the Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries as they protect the natural resources of the state of Louisiana. Join them as they patrol across the country, stopping illegal activities and rescuing wounded animals.

programme.title: Dogs/Cats/Pets
programme.desc: Cats and dogs are welcome companions in many homes, with their loving characters cementing their status as part of the family. This documentary series divulges extraordinary facts about cats and dogs, offering unique insight into their traits and behaviours. Learn about quirky breeds and their distinct qualities, discover their wonderful talents and explore the different ways we humans use them.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr Dee moved to Alaska and started veterinary practice, and now her Animal House is the top animal hospital in the state. Together with her stuff she handles the most extreme cases and treats everyone, from a reindeer to a sled dog. She can reach the Alaskan most remote areas thanks to her pilots license. She believes with all her heart that all animals deserve the best care. Her husband Ken is a great helper, they rescue unwanted and stray dogs and look for a better place for them.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: American animal TV series with designer Antonio Ballatore own show creating the perfect space for pet owning families. Believing that if dad can have a "man cave" and mum a "she shed" then surely there is such thing as a animal crib?! Antonios passion for design and animals shines through throughout every episode. Joined by project manager Grace and their trusty companion Chewie the Bulldog they produce the most fantastic spaces for both pets and their owners. Pets include Chinchillas, dogs, cats and snakes and possibly many more.

programme.title: Legend of Deep Blue
programme.desc: Shark experts Brandon McMillan and Jimi Partington return to Guadalupe Island to search for the largest great white in the world, Deep Blue. Can they unravel the mystery?

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Natures great predators are animals you dont want to come across, especially when you find yourself in their own backyard. In this heart-pumping documentary series, individuals share their stories of encounters with dangerous animals, reliving the frightful, life-threatening ordeal. With stories from across the world, we reveal the heart-in-mouth moments when these lucky individuals managed to escape the jaws of death. From a swimmer mauled by a bull shark in the Bahamas to a close shave with a grizzly bear in the mountains, these stories showcase the fearsome power of predators.

Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Legend of Deep Blue
programme.desc: Shark experts Brandon McMillan and Jimi Partington return to Guadalupe Island to search for the largest great white in the world, Deep Blue. Can they unravel the mystery?

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Follow the daily work of devoted agents from the Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries as they protect the natural resources of the state of Louisiana. Join them as they patrol across the country, stopping illegal activities and rescuing wounded animals.

programme.title: Dogs/Cats/Pets
programme.desc: Cats and dogs are welcome companions in many homes, with their loving characters cementing their status as part of the family. This documentary series divulges extraordinary facts about cats and dogs, offering unique insight into their traits and behaviours. Learn about quirky breeds and their distinct qualities, discover their wonderful talents and explore the different ways we humans use them.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr Dee moved to Alaska and started veterinary practice, and now her Animal House is the top animal hospital in the state. Together with her stuff she handles the most extreme cases and treats everyone, from a reindeer to a sled dog. She can reach the Alaskan most remote areas thanks to her pilots license. She believes with all her heart that all animals deserve the best care. Her husband Ken is a great helper, they rescue unwanted and stray dogs and look for a better place for them.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: American animal TV series with designer Antonio Ballatore own show creating the perfect space for pet owning families. Believing that if dad can have a "man cave" and mum a "she shed" then surely there is such thing as a animal crib?! Antonios passion for design and animals shines through throughout every episode. Joined by project manager Grace and their trusty companion Chewie the Bulldog they produce the most fantastic spaces for both pets and their owners. Pets include Chinchillas, dogs, cats and snakes and possibly many more.

programme.title: Rugged Justice
programme.desc: Animal Planets Rugged Justice follows the officers from Washington States Department of Fish and Wildlife Law Enforcement as they guard the vast borders. It is an elite unit that protect people and wildlife, patrolling coastal areas, mountainous terrains and rugged roads of rainforests. Every day brings a new challenge, dispatchers receive around 25.000 calls annually, every of which requires prompt reaction.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Natures great predators are animals you dont want to come across, especially when you find yourself in their own backyard. In this heart-pumping documentary series, individuals share their stories of encounters with dangerous animals, reliving the frightful, life-threatening ordeal. With stories from across the world, we reveal the heart-in-mouth moments when these lucky individuals managed to escape the jaws of death. From a swimmer mauled by a bull shark in the Bahamas to a close shave with a grizzly bear in the mountains, these stories showcase the fearsome power of predators.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: The story follows the work of the dedicated staff of Gulf Coast veterinary clinic, an emergency animal hospital where patients that require critical care are treated by professionals trained to handle a variety of services, ranging from routine check-ups to extremely complex veterinary procedures.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Follow the daily work of devoted agents from the Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries as they protect the natural resources of the state of Louisiana. Join them as they patrol across the country, stopping illegal activities and rescuing wounded animals.

Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: The Context
programme.desc: The presenter and his regular panel of guests discuss the most important and relevant news stories of the day with correspondents around the globe. Join for expert analysis of the latest big events and exclusive interviews covering various current affair issues.

programme.title: The Context USA
programme.desc: Special coverage from Washington DC and London, focusing on President Trumps second term.

programme.title: The Context USA
programme.desc: Special coverage from Washington DC and London, focusing on President Trumps second term.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Tech Now
programme.desc: The scientists on a quest to improve our predictions of global sea-level rise.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Business Today
programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.desc: A round-up of the days sporting action.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: Tech Now

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Голенко убивает Катю. Малинин в отчаянии. Бражник не верит в видения Малинина и считает его сообщником убийцы, тем более, что в квартире Кати найдены его отпечатки пальцев. Малинина объявляют в розыск. Он скрывается на даче Кати. Тартаковский тем временем задумывает новое убийство - на этот раз, жертва - Татьяна, девушка, которая его отвергла. Малинин снова это "видит". Он пытается самостоятельно найти Голенко, через Васильченко, адрес которого он "подсмотрел", когда Голенко с ним встречался. Но Васильченко подозревает в Малинине полицейского. Он бьет его по голове, приковывает наручниками к батарее и сбегает. Голенко, который в этот момент, уже готов убить Татьяну, неожиданно теряет сознание. Тартаковский озабочен, что произошло с его марионеткой? Малинин удается выбраться из квартиры Васильченко. Он приходит к Николаевой и все ей рассказывает.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Голенко убивает Катю. Малинин в отчаянии. Бражник не верит в видения Малинина и считает его сообщником убийцы, тем более, что в квартире Кати найдены его отпечатки пальцев. Малинина объявляют в розыск. Он скрывается на даче Кати. Тартаковский тем временем задумывает новое убийство - на этот раз, жертва - Татьяна, девушка, которая его отвергла. Малинин снова это "видит". Он пытается самостоятельно найти Голенко, через Васильченко, адрес которого он "подсмотрел", когда Голенко с ним встречался. Но Васильченко подозревает в Малинине полицейского. Он бьет его по голове, приковывает наручниками к батарее и сбегает. Голенко, который в этот момент, уже готов убить Татьяну, неожиданно теряет сознание. Тартаковский озабочен, что произошло с его марионеткой? Малинин удается выбраться из квартиры Васильченко. Он приходит к Николаевой и все ей рассказывает.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Начальник Экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД Андрей Макаров - настоящий спец. Вместе со своими подчиненными - экспертом Ройзманом, компьютерщиком Стасом Кимом и молоденькой практиканткой Лесей Бильчак он выезжает на места преступлений в составе оперативно-следственной бригады, в которую также входят оперативники угро Киценко и Щеглов и следователь Богдана Ковальская. Год назад Макарова устранили от расследования смерти девушки, в которой был замешан депутатский сынок Кушнир. А месяц назад произошло убийство сестры Макарова Ирины, которое списали на обычное ограбление. Макаров уверен, что это было преднамеренное преступление, и он полон решимости найти убийцу.Макаров работает в связке со следователем Богданой Ковальской. Мужа у женщины нет, но есть любовник - судебный прокурор Карпенко, который год назад отстранил Макарова от работы. Макарову предстоит расследовать множество запутанных дел, разоблачить нечистых на руку чиновников, найти убийцу сестры и отстоять свое чувство к Богдане.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Начальник Экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД Андрей Макаров - настоящий спец. Вместе со своими подчиненными - экспертом Ройзманом, компьютерщиком Стасом Кимом и молоденькой практиканткой Лесей Бильчак он выезжает на места преступлений в составе оперативно-следственной бригады, в которую также входят оперативники угро Киценко и Щеглов и следователь Богдана Ковальская. Год назад Макарова устранили от расследования смерти девушки, в которой был замешан депутатский сынок Кушнир. А месяц назад произошло убийство сестры Макарова Ирины, которое списали на обычное ограбление. Макаров уверен, что это было преднамеренное преступление, и он полон решимости найти убийцу.Макаров работает в связке со следователем Богданой Ковальской. Мужа у женщины нет, но есть любовник - судебный прокурор Карпенко, который год назад отстранил Макарова от работы. Макарову предстоит расследовать множество запутанных дел, разоблачить нечистых на руку чиновников, найти убийцу сестры и отстоять свое чувство к Богдане.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex. / Gumball and Darwin are unwitting accomplices in a gas station robbery. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they? / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time". / Gumballs magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart! / Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. While trying to retrieve an arrow from the Other Side, Craig and the Green Poncho run into Maya and Craig finally learns the Green Ponchos backstory - his real name is Omar, he and Maya used to be best friends, and the two of them were friends with a king called Xavier who then pitted the two against one another to ensure their loyalty to him.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. When Craigs mother tells him about the bits of his childhood that he does not remember, he feels that he will forget things when he gets older, so he, Kelsey and JP decide to convert their stump into a time capsule and have Bobby guard it for ten years. Craigs mother convinces him that he needs to create new memories in any event, but Bobby will not give the stump back.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. Thinking that it could mean that the ocean is nearby, Wren approaches the Stump Kids with an expedition to see why the salt levels have risen in the Creek - they head out down to the rapids which no kid has ever crossed, but upon making it through them, they discover that a "creature" of some kind is following behind...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When the crew dock at the Guild for a ship inspection, Lana and Boreas are in charge of keeping the Mighty Windbreaker pristine while the crew go ashore for various errands. The two kids try to spruce up the boat, only to leave it a wreck in a series of mishaps and cons by Trash Imp. Now Lana and Bo must race around Weymouth to repair the Windbreaker before Andar and crew return with Admiral Lovejoy.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When Lana wants to steer the Mighty Windbreaker, Andar makes up a bogus rule that you need to have a beard before taking on such responsibilities. So Lana finds one, but its got a mind of its own. Lana and Andar must find common ground before the beard and its previous owner steal their ship.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Starfire mistakenly thinks shes killed Beast Boy leading him to pose as a ghost and torment her. / The gang agrees to babysit Silkie but then loses him; meanwhile Silkie has a telenovela adventure south of the border. / Beast Boy and Cyborg try their best to slow the pizza delivery boy so they can get free pizza. / Beast Boy takes over as Alpha male of the Titans when he is in Gorilla-mode and Robin has to figure out how to get back on top.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard

With no completed missions, Admiral Lovejoy is about to expel the crew unless Lana can race against the clock to complete a quest, which Horatius connives to sabotage.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana bakes her first-ever Scooterberry cake as an offering to placate a hangry whirlpool, only to have it devoured by Sprog thanks to an oversight by Bo. Lana must navigate friendships choppy waters and whip up a replacement cake before the Mighty Windbreaker is lost at sea.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: When Mordecai and Rigby bust a hole in the wall they must fix it before anyone finds out. They decide to do this using a mysterious keyboard that allows them to do anything. / Mordecai and Rigby try to prove that they are the best prank callers ever, by pranking the Master Prank Caller Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin, Mark Hamill, . Director: J.G. Quintel,John Davis Infantino,. PG

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon hate having to do work as groundskeepers at the local park, trying to slack off whenever they can. When they have simple problems to solve, they often lead to a surreal, extreme, and often supernatural misadventures. Usually this makes their boss, Benson (a gumball machine) extremely angry and on the verge to fire them and annoys their coworker, Skips (a yeti, voiced by Mark Hamill). The pair are always saved by the other manager/owner Pops (a man with a lollipop-shaped head) as he enjoys their constant antics. Co-workers Muscle-Man (an overweight, green man) and Hi-Five Ghost sometimes get involved in the shenanigans, but usually find a way out and leave Mordecai and Rigby in the firing line.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesnt get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.
